SELECT mi_seq AS writer_seq, rev_reg_dt AS write_dt, rev_content AS content, mimg_file AS writer_img, mi_name writer_name, cc_content AS writer_country, mi_reg_dt AS join_dt FROM house_info hi LEFT JOIN review_info rev ON hi.hi_seq = rev.rev_hi_seq LEFT JOIN member_info mi ON mi.mi_seq = rev.rev_mi_seq LEFT JOIN member_img mimg ON mi.mi_seq = mimg.mimg_mi_seq LEFT JOIN member_address_info mai ON mi.mi_seq = mai.mai_mi_seq LEFT JOIN category_country cc ON mai.mai_cc_seq = cc.cc_seq WHERE hi.hi_mi_seq = #{member_seq} AND rev.rev_public =1
LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT mi_seq AS writer_seq, grev_reg_dt AS write_dt, grev_content AS content, mimg_file AS writer_img, mi_name AS writer_name, cc_content AS writer_country, mi_reg_dt AS join_dt FROM guest_review_info grev LEFT JOIN member_info mi ON grev.grev_writer_mi_seq = mi.mi_seq LEFT JOIN member_img mimg ON mi.mi_seq = mimg.mimg_mi_seq LEFT JOIN member_address_info mai ON mi.mi_seq = mai.mai_mi_seq LEFT JOIN category_country cc ON cc.cc_seq = mai.mai_cc_seq WHERE grev.grev_profile_mi_seq = #{member_seq}
LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS house_rev_total_cnt FROM review_info rev LEFT JOIN house_info hi ON rev.rev_hi_seq = hi.hi_seq WHERE hi.hi_mi_seq = #{member_seq}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS profile_rev_total_cnt FROM guest_review_info grev LEFT JOIN member_info mi ON grev.grev_profile_mi_seq = mi.mi_seq WHERE grev.grev_profile_mi_seq = #{member_seq}
SELECT clean_avg, correct_avg, communication_avg, location_avg, chechin_avg, cost_avg, total_avg FROM rev_point_view WHERE rpv_hi_seq = #{house_seq}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT rev_seq) AS total_review_cnt, COUNT(DISTINCT hi_seq) AS hosting_house_cnt FROM review_info rev LEFT OUTER JOIN house_info hi ON rev.rev_hi_seq = hi.hi_seq WHERE rev.rev_public = 1 GROUP BY hi_mi_seq HAVING hi_mi_seq = #{host_seq}
